Symbol.Script_3D: !ROTz -SYMB_ROTANGLE !HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 ! !HOTSPOT 0, pos_y, pos_z, unID, pos_x, 1+128: unID=unID+1 !HOTSPOT pos_x, pos_y, pos_z, unID, pos_x, 2: unID=unID+1 ! !HOTSPOT pos_x, 0, pos_z, unID, pos_y, 1+128: unID=unID+1 !HOTSPOT pos_x, pos_y, pos_z, unID, pos_y, 2: unID=unID+1 ! !HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID, pos_z, 1+128: unID=unID+1 !HOTSPOT 0, 0, pos_z, unID, pos_z, 2: unID=unID+1 ! !LIN_ 0, 0, 0, pos_x, pos_y, pos_z
Symbol.Script_1D:
ROT2 -SYMB_ROTANGLE if SYMB_MIRRORED then MUL2 -1,1
unID = 1 t_priv_1 = 5 t_priv_2 = 2 DEFINE STYLE "текст" Shrift, Shrift_razm, t_priv_1, Shrift_tip DEFINE STYLE "Пола" Shrift, Shrift_razm, 8, Shrift_tip DEFINE STYLE "Разреза" Shrift, Shrift_razm, 8, Shrift_tip SET STYLE "текст"
HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, pos_y, unID, pos_x, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -1, pos_y, unID, pos_x, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_x, pos_y, unID, pos_x, 2: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_x, 0, unID, pos_y, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_x, -1, unID, pos_y, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_x, pos_y, unID, pos_y, 2: unID=unID+1
!Поворот стрелки angl = 0 if pos_x > 0 and pos_y > 0 then angl = atn(pos_y/pos_x) u = -1 endif if pos_x < 0 and pos_y > 0 then angl = 270 - atn(pos_x/pos_y) u = 1 endif if pos_x < 0 and pos_y < 0 then angl = 90 - atn(pos_x/pos_y) u = 1 endif if pos_x > 0 and pos_y < 0 then angl = 270 - atn(pos_x/pos_y) u = -1 endif
if pos_x = 0 and pos_y < 0 then angl = 90 u = 1 endif
if pos_x = 0 and pos_y > 0 then angl = 90 u = -1 endif
if pos_x < 0 and pos_y = 0 then angl = 0 u = 1 endif
if pos_x > 0 and pos_y = 0 then angl = 0 u = -1 endif
ukl_txt = " "
if type_uklon = "градусы" then ukl_txt = str("%.2", abs(uk_deg)) + "°" if type_uklon = "проценты" then ukl_txt = str("%.2", abs(uk_proc)) + "%" if type_uklon = "промилле" then ukl_txt = str("%.0", abs(uk_prom)) + "‰"
otm_txt = str("%.3", perepad) + " L=" + str("%.0mm", l_skat_2d)
TEXTBLOCK "uklon" 0, t_priv_1, angl, 1, 1, 1, ukl_txt TEXTBLOCK "otm" 0, t_priv_2, angl, 1, 1, 1, otm_txt
if GLOB_ID = "-" then RICHTEXT2 pos_x/2, pos_y/2, "uklon" RICHTEXT2 pos_x/2, pos_y/2, "otm" text2 0, 0, "абс.верх " + str("%.3", otm_verh) text2 pos_x, pos_y, "абс.низ " + str("%.3", otm_niz) text2 pos_x, pos_y-0.5, "перепад " + str("%.3", pos_z) LINE2 0,0,pos_x,pos_y HOTLINE2 0,0,pos_x,pos_y rot2 angl addx b*2 b = 0.7 : s1 = 0.6 : s2 = 0.1 : zn = SGN(pos_z) line2 b * u * zn, 0, b * s1 * u * zn, b * s2 line2 b * u * zn, 0, b * s1 * u * zn, -b * s2 del 1 else if type_obozn = "Пола" then add2 pos_x/2, pos_y/2 rot2 angl SET STYLE "Пола" HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_obozn_x, 0, unID, pos_obozn_y, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_obozn_x, pos_obozn_y, unID, pos_obozn_y, 2: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, pos_obozn_y, unID, pos_obozn_x, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_obozn_x, pos_obozn_y, unID, pos_obozn_x, 2: unID=unID+1 add2 pos_obozn_x, pos_obozn_y text2 0,0,ukl_txt b = min(0.7,l_skat_2d*0.5) line2 -b,0,b,0 s1 = 0.6: s2 = 0.1 : zn = -SGN(pos_z) line2 -b * u * zn, 0, -b * s1 * u * zn, b * s2 line2 -b * u * zn, 0, -b * s1 * u * zn, -b * s2 del 3 : gosub "otm" endif
if type_obozn = "Кровли" then
add2 pos_x/2, pos_y/2 rot2 angl SET STYLE "Пола" HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_obozn_x, 0, unID, pos_obozn_y, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_obozn_x, pos_obozn_y, unID, pos_obozn_y, 2: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, pos_obozn_y, unID, pos_obozn_x, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_obozn_x, pos_obozn_y, unID, pos_obozn_x, 2: unID=unID+1 add2 pos_obozn_x, pos_obozn_y text2 0,0,ukl_txt b = min(0.7,l_skat_2d*0.5) line2 -b,0,b,0 s1 = 0.6: s2 = 0.1 : zn = -SGN(pos_z) line2 -b * u * zn, 0, -b * s1 * u * zn, b * s2 line2 -b * u * zn, 0, -b * s1 * u * zn, -b * s2 del 3 : gosub "otm" if pos_y = 0 then pen 41 line2 0,0,-l_skat_2d * u,pos_z hotline2 0,0,-l_skat_2d * u,pos_z pen 1 fill gs_fill_type POLY2 4, 2+4, 0,0, 0,-b*0.3, -l_skat_2d * u,pos_z-b*0.3, -l_skat_2d * u,pos_z endif if pos_x = 0 then pen 41 line2 0,0,-pos_z,-l_skat_2d * u hotline2 0,0,-pos_z,-l_skat_2d * u pen 1 fill gs_fill_type POLY2 4, 2+4, 0,0, b*0.3,0, -pos_z+b*0.3,-l_skat_2d * u, -pos_z,-l_skat_2d * u endif endif
if type_obozn = "Разреза" then ! line2 0,0,pos_x,pos_y hotline2 0,0,pos_x,pos_y add2 pos_x/2, pos_y/2 rot2 angl SET STYLE "Разреза" HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_obozn_x, 0, unID, pos_obozn_y, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_obozn_x, pos_obozn_y, unID, pos_obozn_y, 2: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, pos_obozn_y, unID, pos_obozn_x, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 pos_obozn_x, pos_obozn_y, unID, pos_obozn_x, 2: unID=unID+1 add2 pos_obozn_x, pos_obozn_y text2 0.2,-0.1,ukl_txt b = 0.2 s1 = 0.1: s2 = 0.1 add2 (-stw(ukl_txt) / 2000 * GLOB_SCALE) - b * s1 * SGN(uk_deg), 0 line2 b * SGN(uk_deg) * u, 0, b * s1 * SGN(uk_deg) * u, b line2 b * SGN(uk_deg) * u, 0, b * s1 * SGN(uk_deg) * u, 0 endif endif goto 20 "otm": if dop_option = "Отметку низа" then if tipe_r = 1 then otm = pos_y + SYMB_POS_Y if tipe_r = 0 then otm = pos_z + SYMB_POS_Z if otm = nul then az = "0.000" else az = str("%.3", abs(otm)) if otm < 0 then znak1 = "-" if otm > 0 then znak1 = "+" if otm = 0 then znak1 = "" otm_txt = znak1 + az text2 pos_x, pos_y, otm_txt endif if dop_option = "Отметку верха" then if tipe_r = 1 then otm = SYMB_POS_Y if tipe_r = 0 then otm = SYMB_POS_Z if otm = nul then az = "0.000" else az = str("%.3", abs(otm)) if otm < 0 then znak1 = "-" if otm > 0 then znak1 = "+" if otm = 0 then znak1 = "" otm_txt = znak1 + az text2 0, 0, otm_txt endif if dop_option = "Отметку низа и верха" then if tipe_r = 1 then otm = pos_y + SYMB_POS_Y if tipe_r = 0 then otm = pos_z + SYMB_POS_Z if otm = nul then az = "0.000" else az = str("%.3", abs(otm)) if otm < 0 then znak1 = "-" if otm > 0 then znak1 = "+" if otm = 0 then znak1 = "" otm_txt = znak1 + az text2 pos_x, pos_y, otm_txt
if tipe_r = 1 then otm = SYMB_POS_Y if tipe_r = 0 then otm = SYMB_POS_Z if otm = nul then az = "0.000" else az = str("%.3", abs(otm)) if otm < 0 then znak1 = "-" if otm > 0 then znak1 = "+" if otm = 0 then znak1 = "" otm_txt = znak1 + az text2 0, 0, otm_txt endif return 20:
Symbol.Script_VL:
CALL "Общий шаблон элемента" parameters all
VALUES "var_postr" "Отметка по уклону", "Уклон по отметке" VALUES "type_uklon" "градусы", "проценты", "промилле" VALUES "type_obozn" "Пола", "Кровли", "Разреза"
VALUES "dop_option" "Откл", "Отметку низа", "Отметку верха", "Отметку низа и верха"
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "uk_deg" then GOSUB "deg_to_proc" if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "uk_proc" then GOSUB "proc_to_deg"
values "pos_x" RANGE[-200,200] STEP 0,krat_txt if not(tipe_r = 1 and var_postr = "Отметка по уклону") then values "pos_y" RANGE[-200,200] STEP 0,krat_txt if tipe_r = 0 then if var_postr <> "Отметка по уклону" then values "pos_z" RANGE[-200,200] STEP 0,krat_txt PARAMETERS otm_verh = SYMB_POS_Z if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "otm_niz" then PARAMETERS pos_z = otm_niz - otm_verh if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "pos_z" then PARAMETERS otm_niz = pos_z + otm_verh PARAMETERS l_skat_3d = SQR(pos_x * pos_x + pos_y * pos_y + pos_z * pos_z) PARAMETERS l_skat_2d = SQR(pos_x * pos_x + pos_y * pos_y) PARAMETERS A = abs(pos_x), B = abs(pos_y), ZZYZX = abs(pos_z) else HIDEPARAMETER "pos_z" PARAMETERS otm_verh = SYMB_POS_Y if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "otm_niz" then PARAMETERS pos_y = otm_niz - SYMB_POS_Y if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "pos_y" then PARAMETERS otm_niz = pos_y + SYMB_POS_Y PARAMETERS l_skat_2d = abs(pos_x) PARAMETERS l_skat_3d = SQR(pos_x * pos_x + pos_y * pos_y) PARAMETERS A = abs(pos_x), B = abs(pos_y), ZZYZX = 0 endif
if var_postr = "Отметка по уклону" then if tipe_r = 0 then PARAMETERS pos_z = (l_skat_2d/100) * uk_proc PARAMETERS otm_niz = otm_verh + pos_z else PARAMETERS pos_y = (abs(pos_x)/100) * uk_proc PARAMETERS perepad = pos_y endif else if tipe_r = 0 then PARAMETERS uk_proc = - (pos_z / l_skat_2d) * 100 GOSUB "proc_to_deg" else PARAMETERS uk_proc = (pos_y / abs(pos_x)) * 100 GOSUB "proc_to_deg" endif endif
endd = 1 if endd = 0 then
"deg_to_proc": PARAMETERS uk_proc = TAN(uk_deg) * 100 GOSUB "upd_prom" return
"proc_to_deg": PARAMETERS uk_deg = ATN (uk_proc/100) GOSUB "upd_prom" return
"upd_prom": PARAMETERS uk_prom = uk_proc * 100 return
endif
